grateful.arabicSnippet: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
grateful.translation: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

grateful.arabicSnippet: فَٱذْكُرُونِىٓ أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ لِى وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ
grateful.translation: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.

grateful.arabicSnippet: لَئِن شَكَرْتُمْ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمْ
grateful.translation: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَا
grateful.translation: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them.

grateful.arabicSnippet: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
grateful.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

grateful.arabicSnippet: أَنِ ٱشْكُرْ لِلَّهِ
grateful.translation: Be grateful to Allah.

grateful.arabicSnippet: هَـٰذَا مِن فَضْلِ رَبِّى لِيَبْلُوَنِىٓ ءَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ
grateful.translation: This is from the favor of my Lord to test me — whether I will be grateful or ungrateful.

grateful.arabicSnippet: ٱعْمَلُوٓا۟ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكْرًا
grateful.translation: Work in gratitude, O family of David.

grateful.arabicSnippet: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
grateful.translation: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
grateful.translation: And as for the favor of your Lord, proclaim it.

grateful.arabicSnippet: كُلُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَـٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ لِلَّهِ
grateful.translation: Eat from the good things We have provided for you and be grateful to Allah.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَلَقَدْ مَكَّنَّـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَـٰيِشَ
grateful.translation: We have established you on earth and provided for you therein.

grateful.arabicSnippet: فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَـٰلًا طَيِّبًا وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ
grateful.translation: Eat of what Allah has provided for you, lawful and good, and be grateful for His favor.

grateful.arabicSnippet: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ
grateful.translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَسَنَجْزِى ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
grateful.translation: And We will reward the grateful.

grateful.arabicSnippet: مَّا يَفْعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابِكُمْ إِن شَكَرْتُمْ وَءَامَنتُمْ
grateful.translation: What would Allah do with your punishment if you are grateful and believe?

grateful.arabicSnippet: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ
grateful.translation: As a favor from Us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.

grateful.arabicSnippet: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
grateful.translation: Rather, worship Allah and be among the grateful.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَلِتَبْتَغُوا۟ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
grateful.translation: And that you may seek of His bounty, and perhaps you will be grateful.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَمِن رَّحْمَتِهِۦ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ
grateful.translation: And out of His mercy He made for you the night and the day.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَٱللَّهُ أَخْرَجَكُم مِّنۢ بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ
grateful.translation: Allah brought you out of your mothers' wombs knowing nothing, and gave you hearing, sight, and intellect.

grateful.arabicSnippet: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ
grateful.translation: O mankind, remember the favor of Allah upon you.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَلِيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُۥ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
grateful.translation: And that He may complete His favor upon you so that you may be grateful.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَءَاتَىٰكُم مِّن كُلِّ مَا سَأَلْتُمُوهُ
grateful.translation: And He gave you from all you asked of Him.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَلَقَدْ كَرَّمْنَا بَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ
grateful.translation: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam.

grateful.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ
grateful.translation: Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to people, but most people are not grateful.

grateful.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ
grateful.translation: Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
grateful.translation: And for them therein are benefits and drinks — will they not be grateful?

grateful.arabicSnippet: لَوْ نَشَآءُ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ
grateful.translation: If We willed, We could make it bitter — so why are you not grateful?

grateful.arabicSnippet: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
grateful.translation: He is the One who created you and gave you hearing, sight, and intellect — yet how little you give thanks.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
grateful.translation: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts — little are you grateful.

grateful.arabicSnippet: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلْبَحْرَ لِتَجْرِىَ ٱلْفُلْكُ فِيهِ بِأَمْرِهِۦ
grateful.translation: Allah is the one who subjected the sea for you so that ships may sail upon it by His command.

grateful.arabicSnippet: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱلْفُلْكَ تَجْرِى فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ بِنِعْمَتِ ٱللَّهِ
grateful.translation: Do you not see that ships sail through the sea by the favor of Allah?

grateful.arabicSnippet: كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرَهَا لَكُمْ لِتُكَبِّرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَىٰكُمْ
grateful.translation: Thus has He subjected them to you that you may glorify Allah for what He has guided you.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَاتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا مِّنْهُ
grateful.translation: And He has subjected to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth — all from Him.

grateful.arabicSnippet: قُلْ بِفَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحْمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَفْرَحُوا۟
grateful.translation: Say: In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy — in that let them rejoice.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦٓ أَنْ خَلَقَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا لِّتَسْكُنُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهَا
grateful.translation: And among His signs is that He created for you spouses to find peace with them.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ
grateful.translation: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy.

grateful.arabicSnippet: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَاتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَجَعَلَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ وَٱلنُّورَ
grateful.translation: Praise is due to Allah, who created the heavens and the earth and made the darkness and the light.

grateful.arabicSnippet: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَاتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ
grateful.translation: Praise is due to Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth.

grateful.arabicSnippet: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ
grateful.translation: Praise is due to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى لَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا
grateful.translation: And say: Praise is due to Allah, who has not taken a son.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
grateful.translation: And praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

grateful.arabicSnippet: وَقِيلَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
grateful.translation: And it will be said: Praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

grateful.arabicSnippet: هُوَ ٱلْحَىُّ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱدْعُوهُ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
grateful.translation: He is the Ever-Living; there is no deity except Him, so call upon Him with sincere devotion. Praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

grateful.arabicSnippet: قُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ
grateful.translation: Say: Praise is due to Allah, and peace upon His servants whom He has chosen.

anxious.arabicSnippet: أَلَا بِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ تَطْمَئِنُّ ٱلْقُلُوبُ
anxious.translation: Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.

anxious.arabicSnippet: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
anxious.translation: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

anxious.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
anxious.translation: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

anxious.arabicSnippet: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
anxious.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ
anxious.translation: Whoever relies upon Allah — then He is sufficient for him.

anxious.arabicSnippet: حَسْبُنَا ٱللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ ٱلْوَكِيلُ
anxious.translation: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.

anxious.arabicSnippet: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا
anxious.translation: Say: Nothing will befall us except what Allah has written for us.

anxious.arabicSnippet: لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ
anxious.translation: Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

anxious.arabicSnippet: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱسْتَعِينُوا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ
anxious.translation: O you who believe, seek help through patience and prayer.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
anxious.translation: And be patient. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

anxious.arabicSnippet: ٱدْعُونِىٓ أَسْتَجِبْ لَكُمْ
anxious.translation: Call upon Me; I will respond to you.

anxious.arabicSnippet: فَإِنِّى قَرِيبٌ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ ٱلدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ
anxious.translation: Indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me.

anxious.arabicSnippet: لَا تَخَافَآ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰٓ
anxious.translation: Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
anxious.translation: And those who strive for Us — We will surely guide them to Our ways.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
anxious.translation: And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَ
anxious.translation: If Allah touches you with harm, none can remove it but Him.

anxious.arabicSnippet: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
anxious.translation: Indeed, the allies of Allah — no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَلَا تَهِنُوا۟ وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا۟ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَوْنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
anxious.translation: Do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are believers.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَلَا تَا۟يْـَٔسُوا۟ مِن رَّوْحِ ٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يَا۟يْـَٔسُ مِن رَّوْحِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
anxious.translation: And despair not of relief from Allah. Indeed, no one despairs of relief from Allah except the disbelieving people.

anxious.arabicSnippet: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن نَّبْرَأَهَآ
anxious.translation: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being.

anxious.arabicSnippet: لِّكَيْلَا تَأْسَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمْ وَلَا تَفْرَحُوا۟ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمْ
anxious.translation: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult over what He has given you.

anxious.arabicSnippet: فَإِذَا عَزَمْتَ فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلِينَ
anxious.translation: And when you have decided, then rely upon Allah. Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him.

anxious.arabicSnippet: إِنِّى تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رَبِّى وَرَبِّكُم مَّا مِن دَآبَّةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ ءَاخِذٌۢ بِنَاصِيَتِهَآ
anxious.translation: Indeed, I have relied upon Allah, my Lord and your Lord. There is no creature but that He holds its forelock.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَمَا لَنَآ أَلَّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَقَدْ هَدَىٰنَا سُبُلَنَا
anxious.translation: And why should we not rely upon Allah when He has guided us to our ways?

anxious.arabicSnippet: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
anxious.translation: Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of your affairs.

anxious.arabicSnippet: لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ إِنِّى كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
anxious.translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

anxious.arabicSnippet: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
anxious.translation: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers.

anxious.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
anxious.translation: Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.

anxious.arabicSnippet: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
anxious.translation: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, nor has He detested you.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَلَلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
anxious.translation: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first life.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ
anxious.translation: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَعِندَهُۥ مَفَاتِحُ ٱلْغَيْبِ لَا يَعْلَمُهَآ إِلَّا هُوَ
anxious.translation: And with Him are the keys of the unseen; none knows them except Him.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
anxious.translation: And whoever fears Allah — He will make for him a way out.

anxious.arabicSnippet: أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تَدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَمَّا يَأْتِكُم مَّثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوْا۟ مِن قَبْلِكُم
anxious.translation: Or do you think you will enter Paradise without such trials as came to those who passed before you?

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُم بِشَىْءٍ مِّنَ ٱلْخَوْفِ وَٱلْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْوَالِ وَٱلْأَنفُسِ وَٱلثَّمَرَاتِ
anxious.translation: We will surely test you with fear and hunger and a loss of wealth, lives, and fruits.

anxious.arabicSnippet: إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّآ إِلَيْهِ رَٰجِعُونَ
anxious.translation: Indeed we belong to Allah, and indeed to Him we will return.

anxious.arabicSnippet: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُۥ
anxious.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah — He will guide his heart.

anxious.arabicSnippet: ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ
anxious.translation: Remember the favor of Allah upon you.

anxious.arabicSnippet: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱشْرَحْ لِى صَدْرِى
anxious.translation: My Lord, expand for me my chest.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَيَسِّرْ لِىٓ أَمْرِى
anxious.translation: And ease for me my task.

anxious.arabicSnippet: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً
anxious.translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us, and grant us from Your mercy.

anxious.arabicSnippet: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
anxious.translation: And say: My Lord, forgive and have mercy, for You are the best of the merciful.

anxious.arabicSnippet: رَبَّنَآ أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
anxious.translation: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and let us die as Muslims.

anxious.arabicSnippet: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ
anxious.translation: Is He not the One who responds to the distressed when he calls upon Him and removes evil?

anxious.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
anxious.translation: Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account.

sad.translation: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, nor has He detested you.
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

sad.arabicSnippet: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
sad.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
And despair not of relief from Allah.

sad.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَآ أَشْكُوا۟ بَثِّى وَحُزْنِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ
sad.translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah.
Seek help through patience and prayer.
Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
Do not weaken and do not grieve.

sad.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
sad.translation: Whoever fears Allah — He will make for him a way out.
And will provide for him from where he does not expect.
And give good tidings to the patient.
Indeed we belong to Allah, and indeed to Him we will return.

sad.arabicSnippet: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَيْهِمْ صَلَوَٰتٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ
sad.translation: Those are the ones upon whom are blessings from their Lord and mercy.
Call upon Me; I will respond to you.

sad.arabicSnippet: فَإِنِّى قَرِيبٌ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ ٱلدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ
sad.translation: Indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me.

sad.arabicSnippet: لَا تَخَافَآ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰٓ
sad.translation: Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.

sad.arabicSnippet: أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
sad.translation: Indeed, adversity has touched me, and You are the Most Merciful of the merciful.

sad.arabicSnippet: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ فَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِۦ مِن ضُرٍّ
sad.translation: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity.

sad.arabicSnippet: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ
sad.translation: Is He not the One who responds to the distressed when he calls?
And be patient. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

sad.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
sad.translation: Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account.

sad.arabicSnippet: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ
sad.translation: No disaster strikes except that it is in a register.
And whoever believes in Allah — He will guide his heart.

sad.arabicSnippet: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا
sad.translation: Nothing will befall us except what Allah has written for us.
Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.

sad.arabicSnippet: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ
sad.translation: Indeed, the allies of Allah — no fear will there be concerning them.

sad.arabicSnippet: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
sad.translation: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him.
My Lord, expand for me my chest.

sad.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
sad.translation: Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.
Did We not expand for you your breast?
And We removed from you your burden.
And to your Lord turn in longing.

sad.arabicSnippet: وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَ
sad.translation: If Allah touches you with harm, none can remove it but Him.

sad.arabicSnippet: وَمَا تَوْفِيقِىٓ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ
sad.translation: My success is only through Allah. Upon Him I have relied.

sad.arabicSnippet: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
sad.translation: And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.
Those who strive for Us — We will surely guide them.

sad.arabicSnippet: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا
sad.translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us.

sad.arabicSnippet: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
sad.translation: My Lord, forgive and have mercy, for You are the best of the merciful.
My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor.

sad.arabicSnippet: لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ إِنِّى كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
sad.translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.
So We responded to him and saved him from the distress.

sad.arabicSnippet: رَبِّ إِنِّى لِمَآ أَنزَلْتَ إِلَىَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
sad.translation: My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need.

hopeful.translation: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
Indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls.
Call upon Me; I will respond to you.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
hopeful.translation: Whoever fears Allah — He will make for him a way out.
And will provide for him from where he does not expect.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
And despair not of relief from Allah.
Those who strive for Us — We will surely guide them to Our ways.
So remember Me; I will remember you.
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.
You give sovereignty to whom You will.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: وَعَسَىٰٓ أَن تَكْرَهُوا۟ شَيْـًٔا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ
hopeful.translation: Perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you.
Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: وَيَمْكُرُونَ وَيَمْكُرُ ٱللَّهُ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلْمَـٰكِرِينَ
hopeful.translation: They plan, and Allah plans. And Allah is the best of planners.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: قُلْ بِفَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحْمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَفْرَحُوا۟
hopeful.translation: Say: In the bounty of Allah and His mercy — in that let them rejoice.
And when you have decided, then rely upon Allah.
Is He not the One who responds to the distressed when he calls?
And thus do We save the believers.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
hopeful.translation: Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.
Race toward forgiveness from your Lord.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: وَسَارِعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَغْفِرَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَاتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ
hopeful.translation: And hasten to forgiveness from your Lord and a garden as wide as the heavens and earth.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
hopeful.translation: The patient will be given their reward without account.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ تَتَنَزَّلُ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ
hopeful.translation: Those who said 'Our Lord is Allah' and then remained steadfast — the angels will descend upon them.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: نَحْنُ أَوْلِيَآؤُكُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَفِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ
hopeful.translation: We are your allies in this worldly life and in the Hereafter.
Do not grieve; indeed Allah is with us.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: لَا تَخَافَآ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰٓ
hopeful.translation: Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
Your Lord has not taken leave of you, nor has He detested you.
And the Hereafter is better for you than the first life.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: رَبِّ إِنِّى لِمَآ أَنزَلْتَ إِلَىَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
hopeful.translation: My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: إِنِّى تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رَبِّى وَرَبِّكُم
hopeful.translation: Indeed, I have relied upon Allah, my Lord and your Lord.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَاتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ
hopeful.translation: All praise to Allah who created the heavens and earth.
Is the reward for good anything but good?

hopeful.arabicSnippet: مَا عِندَكُمْ يَنفَدُ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ بَاقٍ
hopeful.translation: What is with you will end, but what is with Allah will endure.
Indeed, the help of Allah is near.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱعْتَصِمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ هُوَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ
hopeful.translation: Establish prayer, give zakah, and hold firmly to Allah. He is your protector.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّ
hopeful.translation: O mankind, indeed the promise of Allah is truth.
Whoever believes in Allah — He will guide his heart.
So take Him as Disposer of your affairs.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: فَعَسَىٰٓ أَن تَكْرَهُوا۟ شَيْـًٔا وَيَجْعَلَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِ خَيْرًا كَثِيرًا
hopeful.translation: Perhaps you dislike a thing and Allah makes therein much good.
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

hopeful.arabicSnippet: فَسَوْفَ يَأْتِى ٱللَّهُ بِقَوْمٍ يُحِبُّهُمْ وَيُحِبُّونَهُۥٓ
hopeful.translation: Allah will bring a people whom He will love and who will love Him.
Indeed, We have given you a clear conquest.
When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest.
And grant us from Your mercy.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَلَا تَهِنُوا۟ وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا۟ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَوْنَ
strong.translation: Do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
strong.translation: And be patient. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

strong.arabicSnippet: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
strong.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

strong.arabicSnippet: حَسْبُنَا ٱللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ ٱلْوَكِيلُ
strong.translation: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِن تَنصُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرْكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَكُمْ
strong.translation: If you support Allah, He will support you and plant your feet firmly.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَلَيَنصُرَنَّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ
strong.translation: And Allah will surely support those who support Him. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
strong.translation: Those who strive for Us — We will surely guide them to Our ways.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَٱسْتَعِينُوا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ
strong.translation: Seek help through patience and prayer.

strong.arabicSnippet: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهُۥ حَيَوٰةً طَيِّبَةً
strong.translation: Whoever does righteousness, male or female, while being a believer — We will surely cause them to live a good life.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا۟ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ
strong.translation: Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟
strong.translation: Those who said 'Our Lord is Allah' and then remained steadfast.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
strong.translation: Except those who believe, do good deeds, and urge each other to truth and patience.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَكَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عَزْمِ ٱلْأُمُورِ
strong.translation: And be patient over what befalls you. Indeed, that is of the matters of determination.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
strong.translation: Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

strong.arabicSnippet: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
strong.translation: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
strong.translation: The patient will be given their reward without account.

strong.arabicSnippet: أَلَآ إِنَّ نَصْرَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ
strong.translation: Indeed, the help of Allah is near.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَلَقَدْ كَرَّمْنَا بَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ
strong.translation: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِنَّا لَنَنصُرُ رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا
strong.translation: Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe in this worldly life.

strong.arabicSnippet: أَشِدَّآءُ عَلَى ٱلْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَآءُ بَيْنَهُمْ
strong.translation: Firm against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَأَنزَلْنَا ٱلْحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأْسٌ شَدِيدٌ وَمَنَـٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ
strong.translation: We sent down iron, wherein is great power and benefits for the people.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
strong.translation: Rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَمَا تَوْفِيقِىٓ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِ
strong.translation: My success is only through Allah.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَمَا لَنَآ أَلَّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَقَدْ هَدَىٰنَا سُبُلَنَا
strong.translation: Why should we not rely upon Allah when He has guided us?

strong.arabicSnippet: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱصْبِرُوا۟ وَصَابِرُوا۟ وَرَابِطُوا۟
strong.translation: O you who believe, be patient and endure and remain stationed.

strong.arabicSnippet: لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ
strong.translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You.

strong.arabicSnippet: رَبِّ ٱشْرَحْ لِى صَدْرِى
strong.translation: My Lord, expand for me my chest.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱلْأَرْضَ لِلَّهِ يُورِثُهَا مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَٱلْعَـٰقِبَةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
strong.translation: The earth belongs to Allah. He gives it to whom He wills. And the end is for the righteous.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَتَّقِ وَيَصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
strong.translation: Whoever fears Allah and is patient — indeed, Allah does not allow the reward of the good-doers to be lost.

strong.arabicSnippet: فَٱصْبِرْ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْعَزْمِ مِنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ
strong.translation: Be patient as those of determination among the messengers were patient.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ
strong.translation: Whoever relies upon Allah — then He is sufficient for him.

strong.arabicSnippet: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا
strong.translation: Nothing will befall us except what Allah has written for us.

strong.arabicSnippet: وَمَا ٱلنَّصْرُ إِلَّا مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ
strong.translation: And victory is only from Allah.

strong.arabicSnippet: هُوَ ٱجْتَبَىٰكُمْ
strong.translation: He has chosen you.

strong.arabicSnippet: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِى وَنُسُكِى وَمَحْيَاىَ وَمَمَاتِى لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
strong.translation: Say: Indeed, my prayer, my sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِن يَنصُرْكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا غَالِبَ لَكُمْ
strong.translation: If Allah should aid you, no one can overcome you.

strong.arabicSnippet: ٱدْعُونِىٓ أَسْتَجِبْ لَكُمْ
strong.translation: Call upon Me; I will respond to you.

strong.arabicSnippet: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوْبَةً نَّصُوحًا
strong.translation: O you who believe, repent to Allah with sincere repentance.

strong.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتْقَىٰكُمْ
strong.translation: Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous.

strong.arabicSnippet: فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ
strong.translation: So recite what is easy from the Quran.

strong.arabicSnippet: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْقُدُّوسُ ٱلسَّلَـٰمُ
strong.translation: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection.

strong.arabicSnippet: فَٱذْكُرُونِىٓ أَذْكُرْكُمْ
strong.translation: So remember Me; I will remember you.

strong.arabicSnippet: أَلَا بِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ تَطْمَئِنُّ ٱلْقُلُوبُ
strong.translation: In the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.

strong.arabicSnippet: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا
strong.translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate.

strong.arabicSnippet: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ
strong.translation: Indeed, the allies of Allah — no fear will there be concerning them.

frustrated.translation: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
frustrated.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
Do not weaken and do not grieve.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا۟ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ
frustrated.translation: Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.
Seek help through patience and prayer.
Be patient. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
Who restrain anger and pardon the people.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنْ عَزْمِ ٱلْأُمُورِ
frustrated.translation: Whoever is patient and forgiving — that is of the matters of determination.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ فَإِذَا ٱلَّذِى بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَهُۥ عَدَٰوَةٌ كَأَنَّهُۥ وَلِىٌّ حَمِيمٌ
frustrated.translation: Repel evil with what is better, and your enemy becomes as though a devoted friend.
Pardon them and ask forgiveness for them.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: خُذِ ٱلْعَفْوَ وَأْمُرْ بِٱلْعُرْفِ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ
frustrated.translation: Take what is given freely, enjoin what is good, and turn away from the ignorant.
Be patient over what befalls you.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
frustrated.translation: The patient will be given their reward without account.
Call upon Me; I will respond to you.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
frustrated.translation: Whoever fears Allah — He will make for him a way out.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: وَعَسَىٰٓ أَن تَكْرَهُوا۟ شَيْـًٔا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ
frustrated.translation: Perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you.
Sufficient for us is Allah.
My Lord, expand for me my chest.
In the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
Your Lord has not taken leave of you.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا
frustrated.translation: Nothing will befall us except what Allah has written.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ
frustrated.translation: No disaster strikes except that it is in a register.
Whoever believes in Allah — He will guide his heart.
Those who strive for Us — We will surely guide them.
If you are patient — it is better for those who are patient.
And urged each other to patience.
And give good tidings to the patient.
My success is only through Allah.
Do not despair of relief from Allah.
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَ
frustrated.translation: If Allah touches you with harm, none can remove it but Him.
Your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
And rely upon Allah.
Take Him as Disposer of your affairs.
Indeed I am near.
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
frustrated.translation: The mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
And Allah makes therein much good.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: فَٱصْبِرْ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْعَزْمِ مِنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ
frustrated.translation: Be patient as those of determination among the messengers were patient.
Be patient, endure, and remain stationed.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
frustrated.translation: My Lord, forgive and have mercy.
There is no deity except You; exalted are You.

frustrated.arabicSnippet: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ
frustrated.translation: The allies of Allah — no fear will there be concerning them.
Is He not the One who responds to the distressed?

lost.translation: Guide us to the straight path.
Those who strive for Us — We will surely guide them.
Indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant.

lost.arabicSnippet: أَوَمَن كَانَ مَيْتًا فَأَحْيَيْنَـٰهُ وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُۥ نُورًا يَمْشِى بِهِۦ فِى ٱلنَّاسِ
lost.translation: Is one who was dead and We gave him life and made for him light by which to walk among the people?
In the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
And He found you lost and guided you.

lost.arabicSnippet: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
lost.translation: Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided it.

lost.arabicSnippet: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا
lost.translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us.
He has guided us to our ways.
Call upon Me; I will respond to you.
So remember Me; I will remember you.
Whoever believes in Allah — He will guide his heart.
Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.

lost.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
lost.translation: Whoever fears Allah — He will make for him a way out.

lost.arabicSnippet: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُصَلِّى عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتُهُۥ لِيُخْرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ
lost.translation: He sends blessings upon you, and His angels, to bring you out of darkness into light.

lost.arabicSnippet: ٱللَّهُ وَلِىُّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يُخْرِجُهُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ
lost.translation: Allah is the ally of those who believe. He brings them out of darkness into the light.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
Sufficient for us is Allah.
My Lord, expand for me my chest.

lost.arabicSnippet: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا
lost.translation: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant to be a warner to the worlds.

lost.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَهْدِى لِلَّتِى هِىَ أَقْوَمُ
lost.translation: Indeed, this Quran guides to that which is most suitable.

lost.arabicSnippet: هُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنَـٰتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْهُدَىٰ وَٱلْفُرْقَانِ
lost.translation: Guidance for the people and clear proofs of guidance and criterion.

lost.arabicSnippet: قَدْ جَآءَتْكُم مَّوْعِظَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَشِفَآءٌ لِّمَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
lost.translation: There has come to you an instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts.
Indeed, We guided him to the way.
Indeed, you guide to a straight path.

lost.arabicSnippet: قُلْ إِنَّنِى هَدَىٰنِى رَبِّىٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
lost.translation: Say: Indeed, my Lord has guided me to a straight path.

lost.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
lost.translation: The mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

lost.arabicSnippet: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
lost.translation: Remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him.
Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both.
There is no deity except You; exalted are You.
Do not despair of relief from Allah.
Your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

lost.arabicSnippet: إِنَّكَ لَا تَهْدِى مَنْ أَحْبَبْتَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ
lost.translation: Indeed, you do not guide whom you like, but Allah guides whom He wills.

lost.arabicSnippet: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱعْتَصَمُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَسَيُدْخِلُهُمْ فِى رَحْمَةٍ مِّنْهُ وَفَضْلٍ
lost.translation: Those who believed in Allah and held firmly to Him — He will admit them to mercy and bounty from Him.
My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor.
Is He not the One who responds to the distressed?

lost.arabicSnippet: لَآ إِكْرَاهَ فِى ٱلدِّينِ قَد تَّبَيَّنَ ٱلرُّشْدُ مِنَ ٱلْغَىِّ
lost.translation: There shall be no compulsion in religion. The right course has become clear from the wrong.

lost.arabicSnippet: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا
lost.translation: Nothing will befall us except what Allah has written.
Your Lord has not taken leave of you.
Be patient. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

lost.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ
lost.translation: Whoever relies upon Allah — He is sufficient for him.

lost.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
lost.translation: The patient will be given their reward without account.

lost.arabicSnippet: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
lost.translation: My Lord, forgive and have mercy.
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَآ أَشْكُوا۟ بَثِّى وَحُزْنِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ
heartbroken.translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah.
Your Lord has not taken leave of you.
Your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
Indeed we belong to Allah, and to Him we will return.
In the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
heartbroken.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
heartbroken.translation: Adversity has touched me, and You are the Most Merciful.
Do not despair of relief from Allah.
Seek help through patience and prayer.
Call upon Me; I will respond to you.
Indeed I am near.
Be patient. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
Do not weaken and do not grieve.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: لَا تَخَافَآ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰٓ
heartbroken.translation: Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
heartbroken.translation: Whoever fears Allah — He will make for him a way out.
And will provide for him from where he does not expect.
Sufficient for us is Allah.
Is He not the One who responds to the distressed?
There is no deity except You; exalted are You.
So We responded to him and saved him from the distress.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَ
heartbroken.translation: If Allah touches you with harm, none can remove it but Him.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
heartbroken.translation: The patient will be given their reward without account.
Give good tidings to the patient.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَيْهِمْ صَلَوَٰتٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ
heartbroken.translation: Those are the ones upon whom are blessings from their Lord and mercy.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ
heartbroken.translation: The allies of Allah — no fear will there be concerning them.
Did We not expand for you your breast?
And We removed from you your burden.
Indeed, the help of Allah is near.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
heartbroken.translation: The mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
heartbroken.translation: Remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him.
My Lord, expand for me my chest.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ
heartbroken.translation: No disaster strikes except that it is in a register.
Whoever believes in Allah — He will guide his heart.
Those who strive for Us — We will guide them.
Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate.
My Lord, forgive and have mercy.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: رَبِّ إِنِّى لِمَآ أَنزَلْتَ إِلَىَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
heartbroken.translation: My Lord, indeed I am in need of whatever good You would send down to me.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا
heartbroken.translation: Nothing will befall us except what Allah has written.
My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor.

heartbroken.arabicSnippet: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦٓ أَنْ خَلَقَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا لِّتَسْكُنُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهَا
heartbroken.translation: And among His signs is that He created for you spouses to find peace with.
My success is only through Allah.
And rely upon Allah.
And the Hereafter is better for you than the first life.

lonely.translation: Indeed I am near. I respond to the supplicant.

lonely.arabicSnippet: لَا تَخَافَآ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰٓ
lonely.translation: Fear not. I am with you both; I hear and I see.
Do not grieve; indeed Allah is with us.
In the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
Call upon Me; I will respond.
Your Lord has not taken leave of you.
Your Lord will give you, and you will be satisfied.

lonely.arabicSnippet: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
lonely.translation: The allies of Allah — no fear or grief for them.

lonely.arabicSnippet: تَتَنَزَّلُ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَلَّا تَخَافُوا۟ وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا۟
lonely.translation: Angels descend: Do not fear and do not grieve.

lonely.arabicSnippet: نَحْنُ أَوْلِيَآؤُكُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَفِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ
lonely.translation: We are your allies in this life and the Hereafter.
Sufficient for us is Allah.
Remember Me; I will remember you.

lonely.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ
lonely.translation: Whoever relies upon Allah — He is sufficient.
And He placed between you affection and mercy.
The believers are but brothers.

lonely.arabicSnippet: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَـٰكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓا۟
lonely.translation: We created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes to know one another.

lonely.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَآ أَشْكُوا۟ بَثِّى وَحُزْنِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ
lonely.translation: I only complain of my suffering and grief to Allah.
Is He not the One who responds to the distressed?
There is no deity except You; exalted are You.
So We responded and saved him from distress.
Do not weaken and do not grieve.
With hardship comes ease.
Do not despair of Allah's mercy.
Do not despair of relief from Allah.
None can remove it but Him.
The mercy of Allah is near.

lonely.arabicSnippet: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
lonely.translation: Remember your Lord's name and devote yourself.
My Lord, expand my chest.
Those who strive for Us — We will guide them.
Whoever believes in Allah — He will guide his heart.

lonely.arabicSnippet: رَبِّ إِنِّى لِمَآ أَنزَلْتَ إِلَىَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
lonely.translation: My Lord, I am in need of whatever good You send.
Did We not expand for you your breast?

lonely.arabicSnippet: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ
lonely.translation: No disaster strikes except in a register.

lonely.arabicSnippet: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا
lonely.translation: Nothing befalls us except what Allah has written.
Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate.
My Lord, forgive and have mercy.
Rely upon Allah.
My success is only through Allah.
If you are grateful, I will increase you.
My Lord, enable me to be grateful.

lonely.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
lonely.translation: The patient get their reward without account.
Be patient. Allah is with the patient.

lonely.arabicSnippet: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
lonely.translation: He sent tranquility into the hearts of the believers.
In Allah's bounty and mercy — let them rejoice.

lonely.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
lonely.translation: Whoever fears Allah — He will make a way out.

inspired.translation: Read in the name of your Lord who created.
Is the reward for good anything but good?

inspired.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا۟ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ
inspired.translation: Allah will not change a people until they change themselves.
Those who strive for Us — We will guide them.
Remember Me; I will remember you.

inspired.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَهْدِى لِلَّتِى هِىَ أَقْوَمُ
inspired.translation: This Quran guides to that which is most suitable.
If you are grateful, I will increase you.
With hardship comes ease.
If you support Allah, He will support you.

inspired.arabicSnippet: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِى وَنُسُكِى وَمَحْيَاىَ وَمَمَاتِى لِلَّهِ
inspired.translation: My prayer, sacrifice, living, and dying are for Allah.
When you have decided, rely upon Allah.
Urge each other to truth and patience.

inspired.arabicSnippet: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهُۥ حَيَوٰةً طَيِّبَةً
inspired.translation: Whoever does righteousness — We will give them a good life.
Your Lord will give you, and you will be satisfied.
Call upon Me; I will respond.
In Allah's bounty and mercy, let them rejoice.
Do not despair of Allah's mercy.
We have honored the children of Adam.
The most noble of you is the most righteous.
Race toward forgiveness from your Lord.
Hasten to forgiveness and a garden wide as heavens and earth.
He has chosen you.
We have given you a clear conquest.
Allah is the Light of the heavens and earth.
As for the favor of your Lord, proclaim it.

inspired.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟
inspired.translation: Those who said 'Our Lord is Allah' and remained steadfast.
Indeed I am near.
Recite what is easy from the Quran.
Sufficient for us is Allah.

inspired.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ
inspired.translation: Whoever relies upon Allah — He is sufficient.
In the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
Indeed, We guided him to the way.
And say: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
Who taught by the pen.
Taught man that which he knew not.

inspired.arabicSnippet: وَلَوْ أَنَّمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِن شَجَرَةٍ أَقْلَـٰمٌ وَٱلْبَحْرُ يَمُدُّهُۥ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ سَبْعَةُ أَبْحُرٍ مَّا نَفِدَتْ كَلِمَـٰتُ ٱللَّهِ
inspired.translation: If every tree on earth were a pen and the ocean ink, the words of Allah would not be exhausted.

inspired.arabicSnippet: وَعَسَىٰٓ أَن تَكْرَهُوا۟ شَيْـًٔا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ
inspired.translation: Perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you.

inspired.arabicSnippet: وَيَمْكُرُونَ وَيَمْكُرُ ٱللَّهُ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلْمَـٰكِرِينَ
inspired.translation: They plan, and Allah plans. Allah is the best of planners.

inspired.arabicSnippet: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَتَّقِ وَيَصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
inspired.translation: Whoever fears Allah and is patient — Allah doesn't waste the good-doers' reward.

inspired.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
inspired.translation: The patient get their reward without account.
My Lord, enable me to be grateful.
My success is only through Allah.
Be patient, endure, and remain stationed.
Whoever believes in Allah — He will guide his heart.
Your Lord has not taken leave of you.

confused.translation: Guide us to the straight path.

confused.arabicSnippet: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَهْدِى لِلَّتِى هِىَ أَقْوَمُ
confused.translation: This Quran guides to that which is most suitable.

confused.arabicSnippet: هُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنَـٰتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْهُدَىٰ وَٱلْفُرْقَانِ
confused.translation: Guidance for the people and clear proofs.
Those who strive for Us — We will guide them.
He found you lost and guided you.
Call upon Me; I will respond to you.
Indeed I am near. I respond to the supplicant.

confused.arabicSnippet: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا
confused.translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You guided us.
Whoever believes in Allah — He will guide his heart.

confused.arabicSnippet: قُلْ إِنَّنِى هَدَىٰنِى رَبِّىٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
confused.translation: My Lord has guided me to a straight path.
Indeed, We guided him to the way.

confused.arabicSnippet: قَدْ جَآءَتْكُم مَّوْعِظَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَشِفَآءٌ لِّمَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
confused.translation: An instruction from your Lord and healing for the breasts.
Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.

confused.arabicSnippet: ٱللَّهُ وَلِىُّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يُخْرِجُهُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ
confused.translation: Allah brings them out of darkness into light.
Indeed, you guide to a straight path.
Remember Me; I will remember you.
In the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
My Lord, expand for me my chest.

confused.arabicSnippet: رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
confused.translation: Our Lord gave each thing its form and then guided it.

confused.arabicSnippet: أَوَمَن كَانَ مَيْتًا فَأَحْيَيْنَـٰهُ وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُۥ نُورًا
confused.translation: Is one who was dead and We gave him life and light?
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

confused.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
confused.translation: Whoever fears Allah — He will make for him a way out.
Sufficient for us is Allah.
Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion.
The right course has become clear from the wrong.
Is He not the One who responds to the distressed?
The mercy of Allah is near.
To bring you out of darkness into light.
He has guided us to our ways.
He will admit them to mercy and bounty from Him.
My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor.
My Lord, forgive and have mercy.

confused.arabicSnippet: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا
confused.translation: Nothing befalls us except what Allah has written.
Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both.
There is no deity except You; exalted are You.
And remember the name of your Lord.
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
When you have decided, rely upon Allah.
Do not despair of relief from Allah.

confused.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
confused.translation: The patient get their reward without account.
Be patient. Allah is with the patient.
Your Lord has not taken leave of you.
Your Lord will give you, and you will be satisfied.
Indeed, I have relied upon Allah.
But Allah guides whom He wills.

peaceful.translation: In the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
O reassured soul.
Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing.
And enter My Paradise.
Remember Me; I will remember you.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
peaceful.translation: The allies of Allah — no fear or grief for them.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
peaceful.translation: He sent down tranquility into the hearts of the believers.
Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦٓ أَنْ خَلَقَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا لِّتَسْكُنُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهَا
peaceful.translation: He created for you spouses to find peace with them.
Is the reward for good anything but good?
We will cause them to live a good life.
If you are grateful, I will increase you.
Your Lord will give you, and you will be satisfied.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
peaceful.translation: Remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself.
And establish prayer for My remembrance.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِى وَنُسُكِى وَمَحْيَاىَ وَمَمَاتِى لِلَّهِ
peaceful.translation: My prayer, my sacrifice, my living and dying are for Allah.
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
Which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
And as for the favor of your Lord, proclaim it.
Sufficient for us is Allah.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ
peaceful.translation: Whoever relies upon Allah — He is sufficient.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: قُلْ بِفَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحْمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَفْرَحُوا۟
peaceful.translation: In the bounty of Allah and His mercy — let them rejoice.
Call upon Me; I will respond.
Indeed I am near.
Praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
Peace, peace.
Peace — a word from a Merciful Lord.
Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ ٱلْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةً وَسَلَـٰمًا
peaceful.translation: They will be rewarded the upper chambers for their patience, and met with greetings and peace.
The mercy of Allah is near.
Your Lord has not taken leave of you.
With hardship comes ease.
We have honored the children of Adam.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَاتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا مِّنْهُ
peaceful.translation: He subjected to you all that is in the heavens and earth.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَا
peaceful.translation: If you count Allah's favors, you could not enumerate them.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ
peaceful.translation: O mankind, remember the favor of Allah upon you.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ
peaceful.translation: He sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: وَمِن رَّحْمَتِهِۦ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ
peaceful.translation: Out of His mercy He made for you night and day.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْقُدُّوسُ ٱلسَّلَـٰمُ
peaceful.translation: He is Allah — the King, the Pure, the Perfection of Peace.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: تَتَنَزَّلُ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَلَّا تَخَافُوا۟ وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا۟
peaceful.translation: The angels descend upon them: Do not fear and do not grieve.
Indeed Allah is with us.
Rely upon Allah.

peaceful.arabicSnippet: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
peaceful.translation: The patient get their reward without account.
My Lord, enable me to be grateful.
We will surely guide them to Our ways.
